Uses of Interface
tripleplay.util.Input.Registration

  • Packages that use Input.Registration 
    Package Description
    tripleplay.util  

    • Uses of Input.Registration in tripleplay.util

      Methods in tripleplay.util that return Input.Registration 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract Input.Registration Input.register(Input.Region region, L listener)
      Configures a reaction to be notified of pointer activity.
      Input.Registration MouseInput.register(Input.Region region, Mouse.Listener listener)
      Configures a reaction to be notified of mouse activity.
      Input.Registration PointerInput.register(Input.Region region, Pointer.Listener listener)
      Configures a reaction to be notified of pointer activity.
      Input.Registration Input.register(pythagoras.f.IRectangle bounds, L listener)
      Registers a reaction using Input.BoundsRegion and the supplied listener.
      Input.Registration Input.register(L listener)
      Registers a reaction using Input.ScreenRegion and the supplied listener.
      Input.Registration Input.register(Layer.HasSize layer, L listener)
      Registers a reaction using Input.SizedLayerRegion and the supplied listener.
      Input.Registration Input.register(Layer layer, pythagoras.f.IRectangle bounds, L listener)
      Registers a reaction using Input.LayerRegion and the supplied listener.
